code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{FaHome,FaUser,FaProjectDiagram,FaCertificate,FaEnvelope,FaBars,FaTimes}from'react-icons/fa';import'./Navbar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Navbar(){const[isOpen,setIsOpen]=useState(false);const toggleMenu=()=>{setIsOpen(!isOpen);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navbar-toggle",onClick:toggleMenu,children:isOpen?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaTimes,{size:20}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaBars,{size:20})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"nav-list ".concat(isOpen?'active':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/",onClick:toggleMenu,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaHome,{size:20})," Home"]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/about-me",onClick:toggleMenu,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaUser,{size:20})," About Me"]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/projects",onClick:toggleMenu,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaProjectDiagram,{size:20})," Projects"]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/certifications",onClick:toggleMenu,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaCertificate,{size:20})," Certifications"]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/contact",onClick:toggleMenu,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaEnvelope,{size:20})," Contact"]})})]})]});}export default Navbar;
